## Input.subscribe() method

Subscribes to an input event and triggers the provided callback.

Returns a function that can be called to remove the subscription.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(eventName: InputEventKind, fn: (e: LocalPointerEvent) => void): () => false | ((e: LocalPointerEvent) => void)[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | <code>InputEventKind</code> | The name of the event (see InputEventKind). |
|  fn | <code>(e: LocalPointerEvent) =&gt; void</code> | A callback function to be called when the event is triggered. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`() => false | ((e: LocalPointerEvent) => void)[]`
